Function Documentation

char* get_file_directory ( char *  file_path  ) 

Modifies full_exec_path directly to remove everything following the final '/'.

Parameters:
full_path The path to a file.
Returns:
The modified character pointer. The pointer is modified directly and also returned for convenience (chaining) purposes.
